about.me: CBROS is a mission-driven Cardano pool based on powerful bare metal servers. It was founded in March 2021. 50% of pool rewards go to charitable donations, mainly to Médecins Sans Frontières - Doctors Without Borders. Every delegator is most welcome! We have NFT rewards for all delegators who delegate more than 10 ADA for more than 3 epochs.
about.server: BP node (Prague, Czech Rep., EU): 6 core CPU, 24 GB RAM, 1 TB SSD, 2TB HDD, 100 Mbit Ethernet, Ubuntu based OS, UPS Backup ----- Relay node 1 (Moravia, Czech Rep., EU): 6 core CPU, 32 GB RAM, 1 TB SSD, 2 TB HDD, 100 Mbit Ethernet, Ubuntu based OS, UPS Backup ----- Relay node 2 (Moravia, Czech Rep., EU): 6 core CPU, 32 GB RAM, 2 TB SDD, 100 Mbit Ethernet, Ubuntu based OS, UPS Backup.
